servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0111: Intake Air Temperature Sensor 1 Circuit Range/Performance

entry.ptxt: Difference between measured max. IAT value and measured min. IAT value is lower than 1 °C (1.8 °F).
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0100 / P0102 / P0103:N32A .

item.ptxt: When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out by 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.

attention3.ptxt: Check to make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Drive vehicle at 50 – 60 km/h (31 – 37 mile/h) for 1 min. or more. (Keep throttle valve opening constant in this step.)
Stop vehicle, and run engine at idle speed for 30 sec. or more.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Description:N32A .

testgroup.title: IAT sensor and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check IAT sensor and its circuit according to Step 2 through 3 under DTC P0112 / P0113:N32A .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
